content: This article explains your options, but it also states that there is no guarantee, since you are dependent on the recipient's decision to send the receipt, plus the recipient's email client's ability to do so, plus the recipient's email provider's policy on allowing return receipts.
creator: davidsk

content: Oops! I forgot to include the URL: http://kb.mozillazine.org/Figuring_out_whether_the_recipient_read_your_message
creator: davidsk

content: Well, Others may have a cleaner solution, but my attempt would be to exit TB, and in File Explorer, locate the trash folder and move the spam folder back to its proper location and restart TB.
creator: davidsk

content: You didn't give the details. I presume you changed your password online. I think you may need to remove the saved password in Thunderbird and let Google prompt for your password.
creator: davidsk
